question.text: Residential status of this household in the community

question.name: Toilet Availabile
question.text: Does the household have a latrine facility?

question.name: Toilet Type
question.text: What kind of toilet facility do members of your household usually use?

question.name: Whether 'Flush' or 'Pour flush'
question.text: If 'Flush' or 'Pour flush', also ask: Where does it flush to?

question.name: Presence of Faces in Vicinity
question.text: Is there presence of feaces, urine or soiled cleaning material in or around the toilet?

question.name: Latrine superstructure affords privacy and can prevent animals from entering
question.text: Does the superstructure of the latrine provide privacy? (please observe)

question.name: Whether latrine is fly-proof
question.text: Is the latrine fly-proof (prevent flies from reaching excreta in the pit)?

question.name: Whether latrine is made from durable materials, or approved resilient local materials
question.text: Is the latrine wall made from durable materials, or approved resilient local materials

question.name: Toilet pit made from durable or resilient local materials
question.text: Is the toilet pit made from durable or resilient local materials (unstable soils), or unlined (stable soils)

question.name: Toilet is shared to other HH members
question.text: Do you share this facility with others who are not members of your household?

question.name: Approx People using the Toilet Facility
question.text: Approximately how many people use the toilet facility?

option.name: Shared with 10-15 people (or less) including other households
Shared with more than 15 people including other households

question.name: Location of The Toilet Facilty
question.text: Where is this toilet facility located?

question.name: Does your sanitation facility leak or overflow wastes at any time of year?
question.text: Does your sanitation facility leak or overflow wastes at any time of year?

question.name: Pit latrine of septic tank has been emptied
question.text: Has your pit latrine or septic tank ever been emptied?

question.name: The last time it was emptied, who emptied it?
question.text: The last time it was emptied, who emptied it?

question.name: Contents of pit latrine
question.text: Where were the contents emptied to?

option.name: I dont know where the emptier took the sludge

question.name: Everyone has access to the toilet all the times
question.text: Is everyone in the household able to access and use the toilet at all times of the day and night?

question.name: Reason for not using latrines
question.text: What was the (main) reason that household members were unable to use the toilet at all times of the day or night?

option.name: The toilet is not always safe

question.name: Where child/chidren (0-5years) defecated last time
question.text: The last time the chidren (0-5years) defecated, where did they defecate?

question.name: Disposal of child feaces
question.text: The last time the chidren (0-5years) defecated, where did you dispose of the feaces?

question.name: Washable cloths cleaned in a safe place and disposable diapers safely disposed
question.text: Is water from the washable cloths or napkins disposed safely?

question.name: Are the disposable diapers safely disposed?
question.text: Are the disposable diapers safely disposed?

question.name: May I take a photo of your toilet facility?
question.text: May I take a photo of your toilet facility?

question.name: Critical times for handwashing
question.text: In your opinion, when should your household members wash their hands?

option.name: Before, during, and after preparing food
After changing diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet
Before and after caring for someone at home who is sick with vomiting or diarrhea.
After handling animals (before and after milking, after contacts with animals, animal products or animal wastes)
After washing and disposal of a used diaper

question.name: Availability of a hand washing facility
question.text: Is a hand washing facility available?

question.name: Handwashing Facilty
question.text: Where do members of your household wash their hands?

question.name: Location of handwashing facility
question.text: Where is the hand washing facilities located?

question.name: Durable handwashing caility with piped water
question.text: Is there a durable handwashing facility with piped water or water storage, in a fixed and appropriate location

question.name: Availability of Water in handwashing facilty
question.text: Is water available at the place for hand washing? (Observe)

question.name: Hands-free operation of the handwashing facility
question.text: Does the water have minimal handling or hands-free operation of the handwashing facility

question.name: Safe drainage for handwashing facility
question.text: Is the water collected and drained from the hand washing facility into a safe disposal point?

question.name: Availability of Soap
question.text: Is soap available at the hand washing facility? Observe

question.name: Time for Washing children's faces
question.text: When do you wash your children's faces?

option.name: Every moring and every day before bed

question.name: May I take a photo of the handwashing station?
question.text: May I take a photo of the handwashing station?

question.name: Handwashing photo
question.text: Take a photo of the handwashing station

question.name: Garbage disposal methods
question.text: How does your household usually dispose off garbage?

option.name: Disposed of in designated waste disposal area
Disposed of within household yard or plot

question.name: Visible solid waste in and around the household compound
question.text: Is there visible garbage in and around the household compound?

question.name: Waste Water Disposal method
question.text: How do you dispose household waste water used for cooking, laundry and bathing?

option.name: Disposed directly to open ground or water body
N/A (cooking, laundry and bathing is done away from the household)

question.name: Where does the sink drain to?
question.text: Where does the sink drain to?

question.name: Adequate soak pits and drainage in the household compound
question.text: Are there adequate soak pits and drainage, with no visible erosion or liquid wastes in the household compound?

question.name: I am now going to ask you questions related to menstruation, are you comfortable and willing to answer the questions?
question.text: I am now going to ask you questions related to menstruation, are you comfortable and willing to answer the questions?

question.name: Aware of what to expect during first period
question.text: Were you given any information on menstruation before you got your first period?

question.name: Able to wash and change during menstrual period in privacy
question.text: During your last menstrual period, did you have space to wash and change in privacy (alone) while at home?

question.name: The Location to wash and charge
question.text: During your last period, Where did you wash and change?

question.name: Menstrual hygiene material
question.text: During your last menstrual period, what hygiene materials did you mainly use?

question.name: Affordable of Menstrual hygiene material
question.text: Was the menstrual hygiene material affordable?

question.name: Source of Menstrual hygiene material
question.text: Where do you get your menstrual hygiene materials?

question.name: Missing activities during menstrual period
question.text: During your last periods, Did you miss any activities because you were on your menstrual periods?

question.name: Use of soap / detergent during menstrual period
question.text: During your last menstrual period, did you have access to soap for bathing?

question.name: During your last menstrual period, did you have access to soap for cleaning your menstrual material?
question.text: During your last menstrual period, did you have access to soap for cleaning your menstrual material?

question.name: Menstrual hygiene waste
question.text: What do you usually do with your used menstrual material?

option.name: Throw it in the pit latrine

question.name: Drinking water collected in clean containers
question.text: Is drinking water collected in clean covered containers

question.name: Does drinking water have any taste or colour?
question.text: Does drinking water have any taste or colour?

question.name: Location of drinking water source
question.text: Where is the drinking water point located?

question.name: water sources clean, protected and well-drained
question.text: Is the water source clean, protected and well-drained

question.name: What do you usually do to the water to make it safer to drink?
question.text: What do you usually do to the water to make it safer to drink?

question.name: How food is stored
question.text: How is cooked and uncooked food stored?

question.name: Where do you store your cleaned kitchen utensils?
question.text: Where do you store your cleaned kitchen utensils?

question.name: All under 5 years fully immunized
question.text: Are the children under 5 years fully immunised (ask to observe the vaccination records)

question.name: All under 5 years received Vit A suppliment last 6 months
question.text: Have all the under-5 children received a Vitamin A supplement in the last 6 months.

question.name: all infants exclusively breastfed until they are 6 months old
question.text: Are all infants exclusively breastfed until they are 6 months old?

question.name: All under-2 children receive foods from 5 or more food groups
question.text: In the last 7 days, did all under-2 children receive foods from the following food groups?

question.name: HH protection with nets on beds, windows, doors
question.text: Does the household use insecticide-treated bed nets on all beds, or insect screens on all doors, windows and other openings into the house? (Observe)

question.name: All children and all at-risk adults received deworming treatment in the last 12 months
question.text: Have all children and all at-risk adults received deworming treatment in the last 12 months

question.name: Absence of standing water or untreated larval breeding sites are visible in the household compound
question.text: Is there visible standing water or untreated larval breeding sites in the household compound?

question_group.name: Safe management of animal and animal waste

question.name: Do your household keep any animals or poultry?
question.text: Do your household keep any animals or poultry?

question.name: Animal wastes visible inside the house, or around the house in the household compound
question.text: Is the animal wastes visible inside the house, or around the house in the household compound (other than in sites where manure is stored)

question.name: animal wastes collected, stored and managed in an appropriate facility, located away from the house
question.text: Is animal waste collected, stored and managed in an appropriate facility, located away from the house

question.name: Presence of penning and confinement of animals in the household compound
question.text: Is there penning and confinement of animals in the household compound

question.name: General Comments
question.text: Any general comments from the respondent?

question.name: Any general comments from the data collector?
question.text: Any general comments from the data collector?
